data.name: Sikanda
data.detailed_description: Sikanda is a top-down 3D Action-Adventure/RPG. More information will follow soon.
data.about_the_game: Sikanda is a top-down 3D Action-Adventure/RPG. More information will follow soon.
data.short_description: Sikanda is a top-down 3D Action-Adventure/RPG. More information will follow soon.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE Instruction Set Support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: SSE Instruction Set Support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE Instruction Set Support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
